Q_DESC: Program Construct a Balanced Binary Tree using Sorted Array. Input: n=number of elements , elements should be in sorted order
TESTCASE_1:
5
10
20
30
40
50
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Given sorted array is
10 20 30 40 50 
The preorder traversal of binary search tree is as follows
30-10-20-40-50-
